latestAction.text: Mr. Rogers raised a point of order against the Gekas amendment (A029). Mr. Rogers stated that provisions of the amendment made changes to existing law, constituting legislation on an Appropriations bill, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.

Mr. Lightfoot raised a point of order against the Gekas amendment (A011). Mr. Lightfoot stated that the amendment would change existing law and constitutes legislation on an Appropriations bill, in violation of House rules. The Chair sustained the point of order.
